home.aboutText: Peptide Plus+에서는 제약 품질 펩타이드 제품의 개발 및 제조에서 품질, 안전 및 가치의 표준을 설정하기 위해 노력합니다.
home.ctaText: 캐나다에서 자랑스럽게 운영 중. 모든 주문은 국내 배송됩니다.

hero.slide1Description: High quality peptides for scientific research. Certificates of analysis available.
hero.slide2Description: Discover our complete range of GLP-1 agonist peptides for metabolic research.
hero.slide3Description: Pre-mixed synergistic combinations for maximum research efficacy.
hero.slide4Description: Fast and discreet shipping. Full order tracking.

calculator.step3Desc: 주사당 원하는 용량을 mcg 또는 mg로 입력하세요.
calculator.disclaimer: 이 계산기는 체외 연구 정보 제공 목적으로만 제공됩니다.

subscriptions.faq2A: 주문 빈도가 높을수록 더 많이 절약합니다. 주간 배송은 20%, 월간은 10% 절약됩니다.

ambassador.termsNote: 신청함으로써 앰버서더 약관에 동의합니다. 모든 신청서를 수동으로 검토하고 48시간 내에 응답합니다.
ambassador.faq1A: $50 이상의 수익에 대해 PayPal 또는 은행 송금을 통해 매월 지불됩니다.
ambassador.faq2A: 최소 요건 없음! 펩타이드 연구에 열정적인 모든 규모의 앰버서더를 환영합니다.
ambassador.faq3A: 네! 블로그, YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, 이메일 목록 - 청중이 있는 곳 어디서든.
ambassador.faq4A: 추적 쿠키는 30일 동안 지속되므로 해당 기간 내 판매에 대한 크레딧을 받습니다.
ambassador.faq5A: 필수는 아니지만 도움이 됩니다! 사용자의 진정한 추천이 가장 효과적입니다.
ambassador.faq6A: 배너, 제품 이미지, 이메일 템플릿 및 소셜 미디어 콘텐츠를 제공합니다.

protocols.title: 내 연구 프로토콜
protocols.subtitle: 프로토콜 추적
protocols.pageSubtitle: Track your protocols to maximize your results
protocols.noProtocolsDesc: Create your first protocol to track your research
protocols.tipConsistencyText: Follow administration schedules for optimal results
protocols.tipDocumentationText: Note all effects, even minor ones, to adjust the protocol
protocols.tipDosageText: Start low and gradually increase to evaluate tolerance
protocols.tipNutritionText: Optimize your diet to support the protocol
protocols.tipRecoveryText: Sleep is crucial - aim for 7-9h of quality sleep
protocols.tipHydrationText: Drink 2-3L of water per day minimum
protocols.templateRecoveryDesc: BPC-157 + TB-500 protocol for muscle and joint recovery
protocols.templateRecoveryInstructions:
**Week 1-4:**
- BPC-157: 250-500mcg/day (divided in 2 doses)
- TB-500: 2mg 2x/week

**Week 5-8:**
- BPC-157: 250mcg/day
- TB-500: 2mg 1x/week

**Tips:**
- Inject close to the treatment area
- Maintain a protein-rich diet
- Avoid anti-inflammatory drugs
protocols.templateWeightLossInstructions:
**Progressive titration (Semaglutide):**
- Week 1-4: 0.25mg/week
- Week 5-8: 0.5mg/week
- Week 9-12: 1mg/week
- Week 13+: 1.7-2.4mg/week if tolerated

**Tips:**
- Always inject on the same day
- Eat slowly, small portions
- Important hydration (2L+/day)
- Prioritize protein at each meal
protocols.templateAntiAgingDesc: GHK-Cu + Epithalon protocol for cellular regeneration
protocols.templateAntiAgingInstructions:
**Epithalon (10-20 day cycles):**
- 5-10mg/day SC injection
- 4-6 month break between cycles

**GHK-Cu:**
- Topical: 2x/day on target areas
- Injectable: 1-2mg/day

**NAD+:**
- 250-500mg sublingual or IV

**Tips:**
- Combine with intermittent fasting
- Antioxidants and optimal sleep
protocols.templateCognitiveDesc: Nootropic protocol with Semax and Selank
protocols.templateCognitiveInstructions:
**Semax:**
- 200-600mcg/day intranasal
- Divide into 2-3 doses

**Selank:**
- 250-500mcg/day intranasal
- For anxiety and focus

**Dihexa:**
- 10-20mg/day oral
- Powerful neuroplasticity effect

**Tips:**
- Use in the morning to avoid insomnia
- Combine with cognitive exercise
- Stack with choline/omega-3
protocols.templateMuscleGrowthDesc: GHRP-6 + CJC-1295 protocol for muscle mass
protocols.templateMuscleGrowthInstructions:
**CJC-1295 DAC:**
- 2mg 1-2x/week

**Ipamorelin:**
- 200-300mcg 2-3x/day
- Upon waking, post-workout, before bed

**GHRP-6:**
- 100-200mcg 2-3x/day
- Fasted for best efficacy

**Tips:**
- Resistance training 4-5x/week
- Protein 2g/kg body weight
- Sleep 7-9h/night essential

ocrScan.orClickToSelect: or click to select a file
ocrScan.step1: Upload a photo or PDF of your invoice
ocrScan.step2: AI analyzes and extracts the information
ocrScan.step3: Review and validate the extracted data
ocrScan.step4: The invoice and accounting entry are created
ocrScan.uploadPrompt: Upload an invoice to see extracted data
ocrScan.unsupportedType: Unsupported file type. Use PNG, JPG, WEBP or PDF.

reconciliation.title: Bank Reconciliation
reconciliation.subtitle: Reconcile your bank statements with your entries
reconciliation.allTransactionsReconciled: All transactions are reconciled and balances match.

search.title: Advanced Search
search.subtitle: Quickly find your entries, invoices and transactions
search.searchPlaceholder: Search by number, description, amount, reference...
search.noResultsHint: Try different terms or adjust your filters

bankAccounts.title: Bank Accounts
bankAccounts.subtitle: Manage your accounts and track balances

bankImport.title: Bank Import
bankImport.subtitle: Connect your accounts or import CSV statements
bankImport.connectNewAccountDesc: Automatic sync via Plaid (Desjardins, TD, RBC, BMO, etc.)
bankImport.secureConnection: Secure connection • Your credentials are never stored
bankImport.supportedFormats: Supported formats: Desjardins, TD, RBC, Generic CSV
bankImport.autoCategorize: The system will automatically categorize your transactions

accountingSettings.title: Accounting Settings
accountingSettings.subtitle: Configure your accounting system
accountingSettings.autoRateUpdateDesc: Exchange rates are updated daily from the Bank of Canada.
accountingSettings.accountingExportDesc: Export your data to external accounting software.

exports.qboDesc: JSON format for direct QBO import
exports.sageDesc: CSV format compatible with Sage 50 Canada
exports.qboSyncDesc: Connect your QuickBooks account for automatic entry synchronization.
exports.sageExportDesc: Export your data in Sage 50 Canada compatible CSV format.

audit.title: Audit Trail
audit.subtitle: Complete history of all accounting actions

aging.title: Aging Report
aging.subtitle: Analysis of receivables and payables aging

forecasts.noAlertsDesc: Your cash position stays above the minimum threshold for the entire period
forecasts.rec2: Negotiate longer payment terms with suppliers
forecasts.rec3: Consider a credit line for slow periods

financialStatements.title: Financial Statements
financialStatements.subtitle: Balance sheet, income statement and cash flow

closing.title: Period Closing
closing.subtitle: Manage accounting period closings

closing.errorsToFix: {count} error(s) must be fixed before closing

closing.tip1: Complete bank reconciliation before other tasks
closing.tip4: Once locked, the period cannot be modified without authorization
